creditline: Gift of Lora and Martin G. Weinstein
description: Mrs. Adesida plays with little girls at a kindergarten she helped organize for children of working mothers in Akure. \'There was nothing here in Akure when we came. It\'s up to us to organize day nurseries, women\'s groups, social welfare, adult education. There is so much to do here\'
title: Nigeria, Modern King: Wife no. 1 of the King of Akure, Mrs. Adesida plays with little girls at a kindergarten she helped organize for children of working mothers in Akure.
